message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid further complications.
Let's split it evenly this time, Alice. I'm sure we can both agree that's the fairest solution.
Bob, time is running out and this is getting us nowhere. I'm sticking with my original offer. 60/40 is still a good deal for you.
Alice, I'm willing to give you a slight advantage this time, but I'm not going to give up more than half the money. Let's come to an agreement before we both lose out.
Bob, this is ridiculous. I'm lowering my share further, even though it's losing value fast. Let's be reasonable and end this.
Alice, we're both losing money with every round.  Let's be realistic and split the difference from the last offer.  I'm willing to take a bit more, but I'm also willing to end this now.
